cookiesPolicy.title: Cookies Policy
cookiesPolicy.intro: This Cookies Policy explains how our website uses cookies, why we use them, and how you can control their use. Please review it carefully to stay informed.
cookiesPolicy.welcome: At nerbixa.com, we use cookies to improve your browsing experience, deliver personalized features, and analyze site traffic. This Cookies Policy explains what cookies are, how we utilize them, and the choices you have for managing their use.
cookiesPolicy.whatAreCookiesDesc: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit our website. These files help us identify your device and store data about your preferences or previous actions on our site.
cookiesPolicy.typesOfCookiesDesc: We use the following types of cookies on nerbixa.com:
cookiesPolicy.essentialCookiesDesc: These cookies are essential for the basic functioning of our website. They enable fundamental features like security, network management, and accessibility.
cookiesPolicy.performanceCookiesDesc: These cookies help us collect data about how visitors interact with our website. This information is used to improve the site's performance and enhance our services. We use tools like Google Analytics for this purpose.
cookiesPolicy.functionalityCookiesDesc: These cookies allow our website to remember choices you make and offer a more personalized experience. For example, they can save your preferences across sessions.
cookiesPolicy.advertisingCookiesDesc: These cookies help us deliver ads that are more relevant to your interests. They ensure that ads are displayed correctly and prevent the same ad from being shown repeatedly.
cookiesPolicy.thirdPartyCookiesDesc: In addition to our own cookies, we may use third-party cookies for purposes such as tracking website usage and displaying ads. These cookies are provided by third-party services, such as Google Analytics, which help us understand how visitors use our site.
cookiesPolicy.howWeUseCookiesDesc: Cookies are used for the following purposes:
cookiesPolicy.properFunctioning: Ensure the proper and secure functioning of our website
cookiesPolicy.enhanceExperience: Enhance your browsing experience by remembering your preferences and settings
cookiesPolicy.analyzeUsage: Analyze how you use our website and identify areas for improvement
cookiesPolicy.personalizedContent: Deliver personalized content and advertising based on your interests
cookiesPolicy.yourChoicesDesc: You have various options for managing cookies on your device. You can:
cookiesPolicy.blockDelete: Set your browser to block or delete cookies
cookiesPolicy.optOut: Use opt-out tools provided by third-party services like Google Analytics
cookiesPolicy.adjustPreferences: Adjust your preferences in our cookie consent manager, if available
cookiesPolicy.note: Please note that blocking or deleting cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of our website and could impact your experience.
cookiesPolicy.contactUsDesc: If you have any questions regarding our use of cookies or need assistance managing your cookie preferences, feel free to contact us at support@nerbixa.com.
